thread.title: Sears and Kmart dump Trump's line of home furnishings | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Sears and Kmart dump Trump's line of home furnishings | Daily Mail Online

author: Regina F. Graham For Dailymail.Com
title: Sears and Kmart dump Trump's line of home furnishings | Daily Mail Online
text: Stores continue to dump Trump: President's own houseware line is dropped from Sears and Kmart following Ivanka's fashion line fiasco Sears Holdings Corp and Kmart Corp have discontinued online sales of 31 Trump Home items Neither Sears nor Kmart carried the Trump Home products in their retail stores companies disclosed their decision on Saturday, saying it was part of effort to focus online business on most profitable items The Trump Home collection includes lines of furniture, bedding and lighting, often from makers that supply Trump hotels News of the two retailers discontinuing sales of Trump Home comes less than one week after Nordstrom announced it dropped Ivanka Trump's fashion line The president said his daughter has not been treated fairly by Nordstrom He tweeted: 'She is a great person -- always pushing me to do the right thing! Terrible!' Published: 16:48 GMT, 13 February 2017 | Updated: 18:26 GMT, 13 February 2017 53 shares
